offer
aggregate
{$match:{$and:[{"product.nr":@ProductXYZ@, "vendor.country":"DE"}, {"validTo":{$gt:ISODate(@currentDay@)}}]}}
{$lookup:{from:"review", localField:"product.nr", foreignField:"product", as:"r"}}
{$project:{"r.text":1, "r.rating1":1, "r.rating2":1, "r.person.name":1, "r.title":1, "price":1, "nr":1, "product.label":1, "vendor.nr":1,"vendor.label":1}}
